jhelp.util.resources

Class Resources

  • java.lang.Object
    • jhelp.util.resources.Resources

  • public class Resources
extends java.lang.Object
    Access to internal resources.
    We strongly recommend to use the Resources(Class) constructor, for resources embed in different jar than the JHelp utilities.
    For resources inside same jar as JHelp utilities, both constructor works
    Author:
    JHelp

    • Constructor Detail

      • Resources

        public Resources()
        Create a new instance of Resources.
        The given path are relative next to the jar that contains this class

      • Resources

        public Resources(java.lang.Class<?> referenceClass)
        Create a new instance of Resources with a reference class.
        The class reference must be in same jar as resources, all the given path will be relative to this given class
        Parameters:
        referenceClass - Reference class

      • Resources

        public Resources(java.lang.String pathOfEmbedResources)
        Create a new instance of Resources with a relative base path.
        Resources to reach must be in same jar as this class, the path given is relative to this Resources class. Then givn path will be relative to the given path.
        Parameters:
        pathOfEmbedResources - Relative path where found resources
